title: [SPAM] Uknown Error has Occured

embed.description: The easy way to save screenshots, GIFs, and websites. Make everyone happy by sharing smarter, faster, and with your point crystal clear.

body: I constantly get spammed an unknown error has occurred no matter where i am in the legacy client. I even uninstalled league an reinstalled the same problem persists. Anyone know how to make it go away

replies.body:
I spoke with our tech team and found out that this is likely caused by your client sporadically losing its connection to our PvP.net or Maestro services. I strongly recommend working through our [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to address the most common solutions for this issue.

Please let me know if this worked for you.
I am having the same exact problem and I don't know how to fix it :(.
